properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: ForceString
properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: GalleryImageDefinition
properties.help: Gallery image definition.

properties.name: GalleryImageVersion
properties.help: Gallery image version in semantic version pattern. The allowed characters are digit and period. Digits must be within the range of a 32-bit integer, e.g. <MajorVersion>.<MinorVersion>.<Patch>.

properties.name: GalleryName
properties.help: Gallery name.

properties.name: ManagedImage
properties.help: Image name(if in the same resource group) or resource id.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: EndOfLifeDate
properties.help: The end of life date, e.g. '2020-12-31'.

properties.name: ExcludeFromLatest
properties.help: The flag means that if it is set to true, people deploying VMs with version omitted will not use this version.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: ReplicaCount
properties.help: Default replicate count. For region specific, use --target-regions.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: TargetRegions
properties.help: Space separated region list, use "<region>=<replicate count>" to apply region specific replicate count.
